titles.title: Tylersville Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
Tylersville Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Tylersville division of the Lamar National Fish Hatchery and Fish Technology Center to the State of Pennsylvania.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe with an amendment. With written report No. 109-339.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 619.

bill.summary: 9/20/2006--Reported to Senate amended. Tylersville Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the state of Pennsylvania the following property for use by the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission as part of the state's fish culture program: (1) the Tylersville division of the Lamar National Fish Hatchery and Fish Technology Center located in Loganton, Pennsylvania; (2) all improvements and related personal property under the Secretary's control that is located on that property; and (3) all water rights relating to that property.
